input.sentences: the festival had a booth that sold delicious hot bread .
there were a lot of inflatable mini games .
afterwards we went to a football game and lots of fans were doing the home team chant .
the cheerleaders came out and showed their school spirit .
one lucky fan was allowed the opportunity to kick a ball into the goal post for a $ 100 cash price . he failed .
output.sentences: Even though it was hot the festival tickets soldout.
The kids played with the mini inflatable games in the lot.
We then watch the home team play a game of sports.
Every had the school spirit especially the cheerleaders.
I post pictures of the event every opportunity i got.
